metadata.Title: CVE-2006-0052

Platform: SUSE CORE 9 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE CORE 9 for Itanium Processor Family

metadata.Description: The attachment scrubber (Scrubber.py) in Mailman 2.1.5 and earlier, when using Python's library email module 2.5, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (mailing list delivery failure) via a multipart MIME message with a single part that has two blank lines between the first boundary and the end boundary.
